鑑.definition: bronze mirror (used in ancient times); to reflect; to mirror; sth that serves as a warning or a lesson; to examine; to scrutinize

鑑定.definition: to appraise; to identify; to evaluate

鑑黃.definition: to inspect videos and other media for pornographic content

鑑黃師.definition: content moderator specializing in pornographic material (both online and offline)
